name: Paper Trails
description:
It all started with a simple robbery. When that thread was pulled, a tapestry of mysteries was revealed.

Play as newly hired clerk Justina Smith as she works with the energetic detective Ernest Hunt to solve a series of cases and find out the truth behind a string of suspicious heists and maybe a murder or two. By digging for clues and following the paper trails left behind, you can discover the secrets buried in the great enigma that rules our lives: paperwork.

• Five interconnected cases

Play five interconnected cases that come together to expose one large mystery.

• Collect witness testimony and evidence

Talking to people and examining the environment is the only way to find the clues needed to piece together any puzzle. Keep in mind that only some evidence will be useful while others will be red herrings. The only way to know is by using logic!

• Outsmart criminals

Not everyone will be upfront with what they know. The only way to break their lies is with cold hard facts. Pick the right evidence and show them the truth will always be revealed!

• Befriend a cat

The most important part of any game.
